attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of DNS server instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the DNS object.

attributes.name: nasServer
attributes.description: Associated NAS server instance that uses this DNS object. Only one DNS object per NAS server is supported.

attributes.name: addresses
attributes.description: Prioritized list of one to three IPv4 and/or IPv6 addresses of DNS server(s) for the domain.

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: Mandatory name of the DNS domain, where NAS Server does host names lookup when FQDN is not specified in the request.

attributes.name: replicationPolicy
attributes.description: Replication policy of the DNS object.

attributes.name: sourceParameters
attributes.description: The DNS parameters of the source NAS server.
